member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.StartDate
member.summary: Gets the date the session started.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.EndDate
member.summary: Gets the date the session ended.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.ClientAddress
member.summary: Gets the IP address of the client that established this session.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.ClientName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the client as reported in its HELO/EHLO command or null.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.SecureConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the session is over a secure connection.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.Log
member.summary: Gets the session log (all communication between the client and server) if session logging is enabled.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.Messages
member.summary: Gets the list of messages recevied in this session.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.CompletedNormally
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this completed normally (by the client issuing a QUIT command).
member.value: true if the session completed normally; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.Authenticated
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is authenticated.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession.SessionError
member.summary: Gets the error that caused the session to terminate if it didn't complete normally.

member.summary: Gets the date the session started.

member.summary: Gets the date the session ended.

member.summary: Gets the session log (all communication between the client and server) if session logging is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this completed normally (by the client issuing a QUIT command).

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.SmtpResponse.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents the response.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.IsSSLEnabled(Rnwood.SmtpServer.IConnection)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to run in SSL mode.
member.value: true if the server should run in SSL mode otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.GetMaximumMessageSize(Rnwood.SmtpServer.IConnection)
member.summary: Gets the maximum allowed size of the message for the specified connection.

member.summary: Gets the SSL certificate that should be used for the specified connection.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.GetExtensions(Rnwood.SmtpServer.IConnection)
member.summary: Gets the extensions that should be enabled for the specified connection.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.OnSessionCompleted(Rnwood.SmtpServer.IConnection,Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession)
member.summary: Called when a SMTP session is completed.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.OnSessionStarted(Rnwood.SmtpServer.IConnection,Rnwood.SmtpServer.ISession)
member.summary: Called when a new SMTP session is started.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.GetReceiveTimeout(Rnwood.SmtpServer.IConnection)
member.summary: Gets the receive timeout that should be used for the specified connection.

member.summary: Validates the authentication request to determine if the supplied details are correct.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.OnMessageStart(Rnwood.SmtpServer.IConnection,System.String)
member.summary: Called when a new message is started in the specified session.

member.summary: Called when a command received in the specified SMTP session.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.DomainName
member.summary: Gets domain name reported by the server to clients.
member.value: The domain name report by the server to clients.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.IpAddress
member.summary: Gets the IP address on which to listen for connections.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.IServerBehaviour.PortNumber
member.summary: Gets the TCP port number on which to listen for connections.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.Server.Run
member.summary: Runs the server synchronously. This method blocks until the server is stopped.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.Server.Start
member.summary: Runs the server asynchronously. This method returns once the server has been started. To stop the server call the method.
member.exception: if the server is already running.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.Server.Stop
member.summary: Stops the running server. Any existing connections are continued.
member.exception: if the server is not running.

member.name: P:Rnwood.SmtpServer.Server.IsRunning
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server is currently running.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.DefaultServer.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate)
member.summary: Initializes a new SMTP over SSL server on port 465 using the supplied SSL certificate.
member.param: The SSL certificate to use for the server.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.DefaultServer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new SMTP server on port 25.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.DefaultServer.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new SMTP server on the specified port number.

member.summary: Initializes a new SMTP over SSL server on the specified port number using the supplied SSL ceritificate.

member.name: M:Rnwood.SmtpServer.DefaultServer.#ctor(Rnwood.SmtpServer.Ports)
